Reference

Bootstrap SASS compilation

Entry points for compiling Bootstrap Sass. bootstrap() is for adding a Bootstrap dependency and bootstrap_sass() is for compiling additional Sass rules that use Bootstrap Sass.

bootstrap() bootstrap_sass()

Compile Bootstrap 4 (or 3) SASS with (optional) theming

Bootstrap themes

Tools for creating custom themes.

bs_theme_new() bs_theme_add_variables() bs_theme_add() bs_theme_get() bs_theme_clear() bs_theme_set()

Create a Bootstrap theme

Theming helpers

Tools for working with themes.

theme_version()

Obtain a theme's Bootstrap version

theme_bootswatch()

Obtain a theme's Bootswatch theme name

bootswatch_themes()

Obtain a list of all available bootswatch themes.

version_default()

Bootstrap major version default
